promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young epic chameleon water-type pokemon holding a blue crystal hammer. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquanvil, a a young epic chameleon water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Crab Impact. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "water" or "Aquanvil". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, chameleon-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sapphire blue galaxy background
generatedDescription: Azure-hued and ocean-born, this Pokemon artfully camouflages in salty habitats. Its Crab Impact mimics tidal force, shattering enemy defenses.
